meanings.definition: Not able to be defeated or overcome.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was unbe in every battle he faced.
meanings.sent2: The mountain's beauty was unbe, standing tall and majestic.
meanings.sent3: The cake's deliciousness was so unbe that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an unbe shield, protecting her from failure.
meanings.sent5: The fortress was built with unbe walls, impervious to any attack.

meanings.definition: To surpass or outdo in a particular activity or quality.
meanings.sent1: She managed to unbe her previous record in the race.
meanings.sent2: The new restaurant aims to unbe its competitors with unique dishes.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to unbe the others in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to practice helped him unbe his own limits.
meanings.sent5: The student worked hard to unbe the top score in the class.
